title: EXCLUSIVE Interview with Alex Jones! This Means War!
description:
A jury awarded Sandy Hook families ONE BILLION DOLLARS for words Alex Jones said. This doesn't only affect Jones; it affects EVERYONE, whether you like it or not. We explain why, and we have an EXCLUSIVE interview with Alex Jones — his first since the court ruling. #AlexJones #InfoWars #SandyHook 

Come See Standup! - http://www.louderwithcrowder.com/tour

NEW MERCH! https://crowdershop.com/ 

GET TODAY'S SHOW NOTES with SOURCES: https://www.louderwithcrowder.com/show-notes-alex-jones-interview
